entry.title: Newsletter #89
entry.content:
TechThursday is here again!

Hello folks!

Please join us in welcoming Armagan our new DevOps Engineer!

This week we released node-nmconfig, a handy wrapper that combines other two Namshi node opensource libraries: reconfig and file-ensure

here is the usual list of interesting links we found this week!
